nodes.text: Star Wars: Saga Look and Find is a children's activity book that tasks readers with finding Star Wars subjects in various crowded scenes from the first six episodic films, similar to the Where's Waldo? children's book series. It was illustrated by Art Mawhinney and published by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. on March 7, 2016, as part of its Look and Find series.
In each of the eight full-spread scenes based on the first six Star Wars films, children look for six to eight "find'ems." The last spread of the book contains bonus find'ems for each scene.
